page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SHELLEY
page.content: In the morning at 7.30 I get up and feel misereble. I have ten minutes lay in then I get up put my tee_shirt and my skirt on.I have a wash then I go down stairs for some breakfast. For breakfast I have some cornflakes & a drink of apple juice. I go up stairs to clean my teeth & my mum brushes my hair;then I get my bag ready. It's Friday so I get Â£1. At 8.30 my mum drives me to school.At school I work on the rubber & the sticker stall,some times I have hard sums. At 9.15 we pack up the school shop. Then we go to class for the register. After the register we sometimes do English but sometimes we have a spelling test.Then we go to assembly and Miss Hammond teaches us to sing and she sometimes reads us a story.At playtime I sometimes play with Marnie ,Katie & Kerri.After play we do maths.
